email_chain.subject: Freight Offer for Iron Ore - Port Hedland to Qingdao
email_chain.body:
Dear Michael,

I hope this message finds you well. We have the vessel OCEAN TITAN (DWT: 180,000, LOA: 330m) available for your iron ore shipment from Port Hedland to Qingdao. The cargo size is 150,000MT on CIF terms. The initial freight quote is USD 18.50 per MT. Laycan is 25-30 October. Please let me know your thoughts.

Best regards,
Sarah Connor
Maritime Trade Solutions

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Iron Ore - Port Hedland to Qingdao
email_chain.body:
Hi Sarah,

Thank you for the offer. USD 18.50 seems a bit high given the current market. Can you do better? Also, could you confirm the demurrage rate per day?

Best,
Michael Scott
Global Charterers

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Iron Ore - Port Hedland to Qingdao
email_chain.body:
Dear Michael,

Thank you for your response. Considering our long-standing relationship, I can offer a revised freight rate of USD 18.20 per MT. The demurrage rate is USD 25,000 per day. Let me know if this works for you.

Best regards,
Sarah Connor
Maritime Trade Solutions

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Iron Ore - Port Hedland to Qingdao
email_chain.body:
Hi Sarah,

USD 18.20 is better, but we were hoping for USD 18.00. Can you match that? Also, can we adjust the laycan to 26-31 October?

Best,
Michael Scott
Global Charterers

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Iron Ore - Port Hedland to Qingdao
email_chain.body:
Dear Michael,

I can offer USD 18.10 per MT, and the laycan can be adjusted to 26-31 October. Please confirm if this works for you.

Best regards,
Sarah Connor
Maritime Trade Solutions

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Iron Ore - Port Hedland to Qingdao
email_chain.body:
Hi Sarah,

USD 18.10 is acceptable. Please send over the summary of terms.

Best,
Michael Scott
Global Charterers

email_chain.subject: Summary of Terms - Iron Ore - OCEAN TITAN
email_chain.body:
Dear Michael,

Here is the summary of terms:
- Vessel: OCEAN TITAN
- Cargo: 150,000MT Iron Ore
- Load Port: Port Hedland
- Discharge Port: Qingdao
- Laycan: 26-31 October
- Freight: USD 18.10 per MT
- Demurrage: USD 25,000 per day
- Incoterm: CIF

Please confirm.

Best regards,
Sarah Connor
Maritime Trade Solutions
